title: Missing annotation on mssql classes for php 8.1
body:
<!--
Please use this issue tracker for bugs and feature requests only. In case you need support please use one of
Yii communities listed at https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/wiki/communities
-->

### What steps will reproduce the problem?

Use MSSQL + PHP 8.1

### What is the expected result?

Working

### What do you get instead?

Error on methods signature

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.? - master
| PHP version      |  8.1.1
| Operating system | ubuntu


### Patch

```patch

Index: framework/db/mssql/DBLibPDO.php
IDEA additional info:
Subsystem: com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.patch.CharsetEP
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/framework/db/mssql/DBLibPDO.php b/framework/db/mssql/DBLibPDO.php
--- a/framework/db/mssql/DBLibPDO.php	(revision 67ea4cf968df26c709fb1e1c369795a99b6699a7)
+++ b/framework/db/mssql/DBLibPDO.php	(revision 01e6da2c89d4d53b5c5fecb5901222e2da88bbbb)
@@ -21,6 +21,7 @@
      * @param string|null $name the sequence name. Defaults to null.
      * @return int last inserted ID value.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function lastInsertId($name = null)
     {
         return $this->query('SELECT CAST(COALESCE(SCOPE_IDENTITY(), @@IDENTITY) AS bigint)')->fetchColumn();
@@ -35,6 +36,7 @@
      * @return mixed A successful call returns the value of the requested PDO attribute.
      * An unsuccessful call returns null.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function getAttribute($attribute)
     {
         try {
Index: framework/db/mssql/PDO.php
IDEA additional info:
Subsystem: com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.patch.CharsetEP
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/framework/db/mssql/PDO.php b/framework/db/mssql/PDO.php
--- a/framework/db/mssql/PDO.php	(revision 67ea4cf968df26c709fb1e1c369795a99b6699a7)
+++ b/framework/db/mssql/PDO.php	(revision 01e6da2c89d4d53b5c5fecb5901222e2da88bbbb)
@@ -21,6 +21,7 @@
      * @param string|null $sequence the sequence name. Defaults to null.
      * @return int last inserted ID value.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function lastInsertId($sequence = null)
     {
         return $this->query('SELECT CAST(COALESCE(SCOPE_IDENTITY(), @@IDENTITY) AS bigint)')->fetchColumn();
@@ -31,6 +32,7 @@
      * natively support transactions.
      * @return bool the result of a transaction start.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function beginTransaction()
     {
         $this->exec('BEGIN TRANSACTION');
@@ -43,6 +45,7 @@
      * natively support transactions.
      * @return bool the result of a transaction commit.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function commit()
     {
         $this->exec('COMMIT TRANSACTION');
@@ -55,6 +58,7 @@
      * natively support transactions.
      * @return bool the result of a transaction roll back.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function rollBack()
     {
         $this->exec('ROLLBACK TRANSACTION');
@@ -71,6 +75,7 @@
      * @return mixed A successful call returns the value of the requested PDO attribute.
      * An unsuccessful call returns null.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function getAttribute($attribute)
     {
         try {
Index: framework/db/mssql/SqlsrvPDO.php
IDEA additional info:
Subsystem: com.intellij.openapi.diff.impl.patch.CharsetEP
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/framework/db/mssql/SqlsrvPDO.php b/framework/db/mssql/SqlsrvPDO.php
--- a/framework/db/mssql/SqlsrvPDO.php	(revision 67ea4cf968df26c709fb1e1c369795a99b6699a7)
+++ b/framework/db/mssql/SqlsrvPDO.php	(revision 01e6da2c89d4d53b5c5fecb5901222e2da88bbbb)
@@ -26,6 +26,7 @@
      * @param string|null $sequence the sequence name. Defaults to null.
      * @return int last inserted ID value.
      */
+    #[\ReturnTypeWillChange]
     public function lastInsertId($sequence = null)
     {
         return !$sequence ? parent::lastInsertId() : parent::lastInsertId($sequence);

```
